tip1: Set a rule for setting a condition. If the condition has been referenced by the early warning scheme, the value rule cannot be modified
tip2: 1. Alarm object: If the data source is the alarm object, the selected fields of the alarm object can be selected as the value rule
tip3: 2, expression: for the condition that the data source is an expression, support to define a function as a value rule, the output result must be a numerical value
tip4: 3, plugin: brought out by the selected plugin F7
tip5: 4, if the line data has been referenced by the warning scheme (including the configured and configured warning scheme), the lock cannot be edited
